name: Charlotte Tilbury Matte Revolution Lipstick
description: Countless women have found a favorite in Charlotte Tilbury's Matte Revolution Lipstick in Pillow Talk—and if you haven't tried it yet, now is the time to do it.

name: Dior Rouge Dior Refillable Lipstick
description: This tube is nothing less than iconic, and it's most famous color has to be the 999 shade that was first formulated back in 1953.It's an absolute perfect true.

name: IT Cosmetics Pillow Collagen Lipstick
description: Line-smoothing collagen and hydrating hyaluronic acid are two of the not-so-secret ingredients that will keep your lips smiling,and they help this lipstick.

name: L'Oréal Colour Riche Original Satin Lipstick
description: Great for leaving lips feeling moisturized instead of dry or sticky, this classic tube always brings on the compliments.

name: The Coolest Choice: Glossier Ultralip
description: This cult-favorite brand finally launched a full-on lipstick, which they've dubbed the cashmere sweatpants of lipstick.

name: Rare Beauty Lip Souffle Matte Cream Lipstick
description: One of our new favorite affordable beauty brands on the market, Rare Beauty has us swooning over this weightless, air-whipped lip cream

name: Best for Sheer Tint Bobbi Brown Crushed Shine Jelly Stick
description: This grab-and-go tube is as stinking cute as the sheer, high-shine formula once it's applied to your lipsIt gives a juicy wash of color that is perfect for the more low-maintenance.

name: Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick
description: This drugstore staple is perfect for those trying to dip their toes into the matte or liquid lipstick pool for the first time.flush with rave reviews across

name: Best Swipe-and-Go Stick: Clinique Almost Lipstick
description: The sheer, raisin Black Honey shade of this almost lipstick deserves every ounce of praise it has received over the years—and it recently celebrated its 30th anniversary.

name: Lancôme L'Absolu Rouge Drama Ink Liquid Lipstick
description: When this new liquid lipstick landed on our doorstep, it immediately commanded a moment of silent appreciation—especially for how long it stayed on our hand after testing out a swipe.
